message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $12000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe it's a reasonable price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I've done my research and know that this product has a higher value to you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to go down to $11500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still thinking $11000 is a more reasonable price for me. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.

I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, but I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much.
